# GitHub Profile Overlays

`src/github/` contains the org baseline.

Use `src/github/profiles/` for repo-type-specific overlays that extend the baseline without changing it.

Current overlays:
- `dependabot-node.yml`
- `dependabot-python.yml`
- `dependabot-submodule-compass-engine.yml`
- `dependabot-submodule-bmad-method.yml`
- `workflows/check-bmad-updates.yml`
